Concept Title: Solve the puzzle to save the princess
Description: Set a goal for the game to give kids a target to pursue.
Every game should have multiplayer mode so that kids can play with friends.
Players can get reward after completion of assigned mission. For example; they could get the materials they need to build their village for a strategy game.
Since our users are kids; we need to keep the instructions or any other texts in the game as simple as possible.
